comment: This was such a easy class. Lots of writing but its spilt up in a very easy way! I really enjoyed his class. He does grade attendance but even though I did not go to class that often I still ended with a 97. Work is super easy, literally just do the assignments and you will do fine.

He's a good professor. Attendance is taken but not required. The course builds toward a final paper, with weekly book assignments and a few short, easy quizzes (usually 3 questions). There's little group work, but you'll sometimes chat with neighbors and review peers' papers before submitting your final.

This professor is very laid back. There is only one essay that you have to do and you basically work on it the entire semester, all your assignments help prepare you for it and make writing it so easy. There is some reading but it is not hard and pretty self explanatory, I just skimmed through it. Online lecture and in person are basically the same

TAKE HIM. Nicest, most caring teacher at KSU. He will work with you and help you, so if you aren't a great writer, that is okay. He helps you so much. He is so encouraging and always cheers you on. 10/10 would take him over and over again.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: He was great!!! He is very caring of students and passionate. Most people do not like English, but he made me love his class. It was clear what was expected, but also understands we have lives outside of class. TAKE HIM!! We basically worked on a research project the entire semester & it was researching something we pick.

He is a very sweet professor! He is hilarious and very informative during is lectures and is willing to help if you have questions! He really cares about his students! I plan on taking his 1102 class!

If you're in need of an English professor, this is the one for you. I've never had so much freedom when it came to writing. You are able to select any topic to write about depending on the paper and there's only about 4-5 major pieces you will do that are also parts to your final exam.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Professor Compton is genuinely the best English teacher I've ever had, and this is coming from someone who's attended countless writing classes and workshops. He's effortlessly hilarious and supportive of his students and gives you everything (and more) that you could ever need to succeed in his class. Very sweet, a yapper in a good way!! Love him
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Loved this professor. He is so nice and gives good feedback on any question you have. Also, he is willing to help with any assignment. His essay prompts were straightforward and not too hard. Definitely take his class if you want an A.

Very chilled out professor. Took him for 1102 and usually I hate English classes due to the vague criteria but his wasn't bad. Was a pretty lenient grader and as long as you put in effort, you should do well in his class. Attendance wasn't mandatory.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: Some homework, papers are easy enough. Grades fast so you always know what you have. Gives good feedback and is a really caring guy who wants his students to succeed. Lectures go over everything in detail and it always available for questions.

He talks the entire class but he goes over everything in DETAIL. He spends weeks talking about each paper and gives little steps to help you write it. He walks around to help give people ideas and give feedback. He is super sweet and cares a lot about his class. 5 major papers but its english so duh. Discussion posts weekly. Hard to fail

Professor Compton is super nice. He cares a lot about his students, is super chill, and understanding. He is not a harsh grader and gives really good feedback on your papers. There were times when the lecture got boring however, he tried his best to make it engaging. I would totally recommend taking his class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: I believe you all should take this professor. He is understanding, he makes you feel comfortable in your writing. He believes in all of his students. Take him!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback

comment: He's a very kind and knowledgeable professor. The class is very easy, despite a few peer reviews. As long as you make a good attempt and turn in things you'll probably be fine.
Professor Compton is AMAZING i had him for 1101 and 1102 and both classes were so easy and he is so nice and makes some funny jokes, if you are taking english TAKE HIM!!!!!
IF YOU ARE READING THIS, PLEASE, I BEG YOU, TAKE THIS CLASS!!!!! Professor Compton is absolutely PHENOMENAL!

Professor Compton is very nice and is an easy grader. The whole class consisted of working your way up to a 5-7 page research paper. The best part is that your essay can be about any topic you would like. For an English class, I definitely recommend taking him if you want to stay interested throughout the semester.
I love this professor! he is the best. There are going to be a lot of readings and a few assignments with plenty of time. TAKE HIM IF U WANT EASY A!!!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback

comment: Took this as a hybrid class, it was great. Not hard at all, we wrote essays on interesting topics, I think we had 3 or 4 essays max, not a harsh grader. HW took less than 30 minutes to complete.
